bibl.title: Letter from Rupert Blue to Henry Rose Carter, May 5, 1916

div1.p: Blue requests that Carter report to the Public Health Service Bureau for a conference.

div1.head: Letter from Rupert Blue to Henry Rose Carter, May 5, 1916
div1.opener:
JKb
OFFICE OF THE SURGEON GENERAL
IN REPLYING
ADDRESS THE SURGEON GENERAL
U. S. PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE
TREASURY DEPARTMENT
BUREAU OF
THE PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE
WASHINGTON
May 5, 1916.
WMT
Assistant Surgeon-General H. R. Carter,
U. S. Marine Hospital,
Baltimore, Maryland.
Sir:
div1.p:
Confirming telephone instructions, you are hereby
directed to report at the Bureau on May 5th for confer-
ence.

On the completion of this duty you will rejoin your
station, Baltimore, Maryland.
div1.closer:
Respectfully, Rupert Blue,
Surgeon-General. ANS
J
The expenses incurred in carrying out the foregoing
instructions are hereby authorized.
Wu
Assistant Secretary.
Th
Mc
